name: BlockuDoku - Block Puzzle
description:
Match blocks to complete lines and squares to get them removed. Keep the board clean and beat your high score. BlockuDoku is a simple yet challenging puzzle game you won’t be able to put aside.

How to play:

- Drop the blocks on the 9x9 grid
- Fill up lines and squares to keep the board clean
- Destroy several elements at once to make a Combo
- Make several successful moves in a row to get a Streak
- Beat your high score and compete with other players in Game Center
- Customize the game with the theme of your taste.

Relieve stress or train your brain with a relaxing yet challenging game of BlockuDoku anywhere, any time!
